section.title: Common Questions
section.description: Helpful details for procurement and supply planning.

items.question: What products do you manufacture?
items.answer: We manufacture converted paper products including custom-sized rolls and industrial packaging paper.

items.question: What is the typical lead time?
items.answer: Lead time depends on volume and specification. Our team will confirm schedule after reviewing your requirements.

items.question: Can you handle custom sizes?
items.answer: Yes. We offer flexible sizing, slitting, and finishing to meet custom requirements.

items.question: What quality standards do you follow?
items.answer: We apply consistent quality control across incoming materials and finished products.
